name: Magikarp

passive.name: Jump the Waterfall
passive.effect: You may only attach Energies to this Pokemon while it is your Active Pokemon. When this Pokemon has 3 Water Energies attached to it, you may search your deck for a Gyrados and place it on this Pokemon, evolving it.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.effect: Deal 10 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokemon.

flavor: Legends say that some Magikarp really do manage to jump the waterfall. There are many more than that that try, though.
